ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

Numeric Visit Number
Notes: -1.5 = Pre-Screening; -1 = Screening; 0 = Baseline; ## = Visit ## (from 1 to 10); Whole numbers = standard monthly visits; #.001 - #.009 = Unscheduled; #.1 = End of Phase 1; #.2 = End of Phase 2; #.3 = End of Phase 3; #.4 = End of Open Choice Phase; #.5 = End of Study; #.6 = Genetic Analysis; 1000=all visits

ElementDescription: Are you currently or have you ever been involved in a romantic relationship?
Notes: 0=No, 1=Yes. Only those who answer "yes" are presented with the subsequent items

ElementDescription: ECR: Mean Anxiety Score
ECR: Mean Avoidance Score
Timepoint
Notes: 0=Screening; 1=Intake; 2=3 months; 3=6 months; 4=9 months; 5=12 months; 6=24 months; 7 = pre-intervention; 8 = post-intervention

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: ECR Sum Score
I need a lot of reassurance that I am loved by my partner
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I want to get close to my partner, but I keep pulling back
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I turn to my partner for many things, including comfort and reassurance
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I try to avoid getting too close to my partner
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I get frustrated if romantic partner are not available when I need them
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I''m not involved in a relationship, I feel somewhat anxious and insecure.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: I get frustrated when my partner is not around as much as I would like.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: I don''t mind asking romantic partners for comfort, advice, or help.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: When romantic partners disapprove of me, I feel really bad about myself.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: I resent it when my partner spends time away from me.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: I worry about being abandoned.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: Just when my partner starts to get close to me I find myself pulling away.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: I worry a fair amount about losing my partner.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: I often want to merge completely with romantic partners, and this sometimes scares them away.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: I worry about being alone.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: Sometimes I feel that I force my partners to show more feeling, more commitment.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: If I can''t get my partner to show interested in me, I get upset or angry.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Somewhat disagree; 4=Neutral; 5=Somewhat agree; 6=Agree; 7=Strongly agree; 9999=Prefer not to answer/left blank.

ElementDescription: Rate the extent to which you believe each statement best describes how you feel about close relationships in general: I am afraid that other people may abandon me.
Rate the extent to which you believe each statement best describes how you feel about close relationships in general: I worry that others will not care about me as much as I care about them.
Rate the extent to which you believe each statement best describes how you feel about close relationships in general: It helps to turn to people in times of need.
Rate the extent to which you believe each statement best describes how you feel about close relationships in general: I usually discuss my problems and concerns with others.
Rate the extent to which you believe each statement best describes how you feel about close relationships in general: I talk things over with people.
Rate the extent to which you believe each statement best describes how you feel about close relationships in general: I find it easy to depend on others.
Rate the extent to which you believe each statement best describes how you feel about close relationships in general: I do not feel comfortable opening up to others.
Rate the extent to which you believe each statement best describes how you feel about close relationships in general: I prefer not to show others how I feel deep down.
Rate the extent to which you believe each statement best describes how you feel about close relationships in general: I often worry that other people do not really care for me.
It helps to turn to my romantic partner in times of need.
I do not often worry about being abandoned.
I usually discuss my problems and concerns with my partner.
I worry that romantic partners won't care about me as much as I care about them.
Experience in Close Relationship Scale-Short Form (ECR-S) - Anxious subscale
Notes: Sum of items ecr_reassurance, ecr_13anx, ecr_15anx, ecr_s8, ecr_frustrated, ecr_s12; Higher scores assume insecure adult attachment orientation

ElementDescription: Experience in Close Relationship Scale-Short Form (ECR-S) - Avoidant subscale
Notes: Sum of items ecr_s1, ecr_pullback, ecr_turnto, ecr_avoidclose, ecr_s9, ecr_33av_r; Higher scores assume insecure adult attachment orientation
